title: FS/FT:  St Louis Browns T201, T204, T207
author: Archive

posts.post_title: FS/FT:  St Louis Browns T201, T204, T207
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Aaron Cowan
Here are the four cards for sale/trade:

T204 Hartzell (Ramly) - $60 (three pinholes, one with card loss above head; scrapbook residue on back)  SOLD***************
T201 Laporte/Stephens - $30 (creases on the bottom of the card) SOLD*******
T207 Hamilton (Recruit) - $15 (creases, wrinkling; very small paper loss on mouth and right border)
T207 Hallihan (Recruit) - $20 (good clean surface; back is a little dirty with some small paper loss)

-=:Scans are available upon request:=-

Please know that these prices are negotiable.  As far as trades go I have a very short and specific list:

T207 Konetchy, Oakes, or Evans
T205 Harmon (both ears)
T201 Hauser/Lush

Emails take priority over replies to this thread as I check my email more often than this site.  Then again, I don't expect hordes of people to fall over themselves for these "gems."  Anyway, like I said scans of the front are available.  I'll try and get some back scans made within a day or two.

Aaron Cowan - acowan19@gmail.com
